summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GridWise energy dashboard. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend integration significantly improved - Dashboard, Wind Power, and Solar Power views working perfectly. Machine Consumption view has loading issues preventing full functionality.

integration_issues.issue: Machine Consumption page gets stuck in loading state and doesn't complete data loading
integration_issues.impact: Users cannot view machine energy consumption charts, temperature monitoring, or anomaly details for machines

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 7/7 endpoints)
Dashboard view fully functional with live stats, charts, AI insights, anomaly detection
Wind Power page shows Actual vs Predicted chart with detailed statistics and AI insights
Solar Power page shows chart with statistics and proper data visualization
Navigation works between Dashboard, Wind Power, Solar Power views
Date selector changes data (30 available dates, successfully switches between dates)
Live indicator shows real-time streaming values (Wind, Solar, Grid Frequency, Total Load)
AI Insights panel provides detailed analysis and recommendations
Energy Generation Overview chart displays proper data curves
Energy Distribution pie chart shows Wind (28.3%) vs Solar (71.7%) breakdown
Detected Anomalies panel shows 20 alerts with machine-specific data
Real-time data updates every 2-3 seconds via WebSocket fallback
Responsive design with modern dark theme UI

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 7 APIs working perfectly with proper data
success_percentage.frontend_ui: 95% - Excellent UI/UX with minor loading performance issues
success_percentage.integration: 85% - Dashboard, Wind, Solar views fully functional; Machine view has loading issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Machine Consumption view loading issue. The page gets stuck in loading state and doesn't render the machines-view testid element. Check date handling logic in App.js line 108 (machineDate variable) and ensure machine consumption API calls complete properly. All other features working excellently.
